resources.string: Dummy App is an application for Android OS, created by Lolis Vasileios for his Diploma Thesis at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (AUTH), under the supervision of Assistant Professor, Andreas L. Symeonidis.
